DESCRIPTION: One of the four realms.
One of the four realms.
One of the four realms.
One of the four realms.
A type of card that is not routinely available and is usually beneficial to the player.
In Morimens, a special card type consisting entirely of #yAbility cards.
The most common card type in Eve of Forgotten consists of #yAttack and #ySkill cards.
In Morimens, a special card type consisting entirely of #yAbility cards.
A type of card that is not routinely available and is generally harmful to the player.
A type of card that is not normally obtainable and is usually harmful to the player. Usually obtained from enemies.
Basic #yDefend cards and all cards that counts as #yDefend.
Improves the effect of the initial relics of the realm.

When the upper limit is reached, you can unleash #yExalt, and when the #yAliemus reaches #b2 times the upper limit, you can unleash #rOver-Exlataion. Usually, you can only release #yExalt or #rOver-Exlataion once per turn.
After unleashing #yExalt or #rOver-Exaltation, you will automatically gain #yAliemus equal to the #yAliemus #yRegen attribute value.
Ability unleashed by consuming #yAliemus.
An enhanced version of #yExalt.
Consuming [E] will gain #yKeyflare. The #yKeyflare #yRegen attribute determines how much #yKeyflare you gain for every #b1 [E] you consume.
The #yKeyflare #yRegen attribute determines how much #yKeyflare you gain for every #b1 [E] you consume.

When #yKeyflare reaches #b1000, you can release #yPosse you carried. You can release #yPosse #b2 times per turn. At the #bsecond time, you may only choose #b1 out of #b3 random #yPosse, and the selected #yPosse cannot be selected again in same combat.
The effect is only for this round.
Non #yTemporary #yStrength, that is, #yStrength amount minus #yFlex amount.
Unable to unleash #yExalt. Reduced #b1 stack when the turn ends.
At the end of the turn, take the corresponding amount of damage. Healing removes double the amount of #rBleed stacks.
Remain in the deck after the battle ends.
Once played, it is permanently removed from the deck.
When turn ends, reduce [E] Cost by #bX. This effect triggers even if discarded.
Trigger the #bAftershock effect when discarded.
Damage reduce both #yBlock and HP, Cannot be immune.
This card does not appear in battle and is effective in the deck.
Trigger at the start of next turn.

Each time you play another card, reduce this card's [E] Cost by #b1 for the next play; after playing this card, return it to your hand and increase its [E] Cost by #b1, reset when the turn ends or when discarded.
A #ystance unique to the #bAequor #bRealm. When entering the #bTranquil #bSea #ystance, you gain #yBlock, but the #yTentacle #yDamage is halved during that turn.

With #b3 stacks of #yNegentropy, using a card with #yLoop effect consumes #b3 stacks of #yNegentropy and trigger the #yLoop effect. #yNegentropy can be stacked up to #b3 and will be carried over to the next battle.
Unique additional effect of #yRamona:Timeworm's #yCommand #yCard, triggered when there are #b3 stacks of #yNegentropy.

A unique #ystance for #yDoll:Inferno. When #pThe #pEnd reaches #b10 stacks, automatically place #b1 "The Void and The End" in your hand. Enter #pStance #pof #pThe #pEnd by playing "The Void and The End".
Increases Base Damage, Base #pPoison, Base #bThorns, Base #yTentacle #yDamage by #b50%. Reduces #b1 stack at the end of round.
Increase all active damage dealt by #b25%. Reduce by #b1 stack at the end of the round.
Immune to the next active attack damage received.
Includes gaining #b10 #yAliemus, inflicting #rVulnerable on all enemies for #b1 turn, inflicting #pWeak on all enemies for #b1 turn, drawing #b1 card, gaining #b200 #yKeyflare.
Includes #rBleed (equal to #b150% damage), #pPoison (equal to #b75% damage), apply #b1 #rVulnerable, apply #b1 #pWeak, #yTemporary #yStrength #b-3.
This card returns to your hand after being played, and the #yOrison will be disabled until the end of the turn.
